In England, in the seven days to 29 April, there were 73,876 new confirmed cases (130.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 April, there were 117,269 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 37% (43,393 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 May is 18,580,049 (32,855.9 cases per 100,000 population).
